title.rendered: National Puzzle Day + Robins Regional Pinnacle Awards

content.rendered:
National Puzzle Day

National Puzzle Day is January 29th. Did you know that we carry a variety of puzzles, including floor and sound puzzles, for all ages? Educational and engaging, pick up a few of our puzzles to celebrate National Puzzle Day with your family!

 

Pinnacle Awards

The Gottwals Books (Warner Robins) crew showed up IN FORCE for the Robins Regional Chamber’s Pinnacle Awards last week. We received honors for Rockstar (Christy Rozier) and finalist for Small Business of the Year.

 

Warehouse Update

We are filling up shelves and emptying boxes.  Here’s Joy building up Box Mountain.  A few hundred books down… a few thousand to go!  Quadrupling our storage capacity is fantastic, but it’s a lot of work to move a couple hundred thousand books.
